modName: SCOPE - Skyrim Community Overhaul Packed Enhancement
summary: SCOPE is the result of years of work from hundreds of authors compiled into a single overhaul consisting of 2 NMM-ready modules thanks to the best of STEP/GEMS guides as well as my personal tweaks/additions to achieve the most lore-friendly/atmospheric/visually stunning Skyrim with challenging gameplay. NO FPS loss. Rigorously tested!
author: segal2810
